name: Rum Sugar Lime
description: Rum Sugar Lime brings tropical vibes to Reno's Midtown district with an extensive rum-focused cocktail program and Caribbean-inspired atmosphere. The bar features over 100 rums from around the world, creative tiki-style cocktails, and a lively ambiance complete with island décor and reggae beats. It's become a local favorite for its festive energy and inventive drinks.
shortDescription: Tropical rum bar with 100+ rums, tiki cocktails, and Caribbean vibes in Reno's Midtown.

faqs.question: What makes Rum Sugar Lime special?
faqs.answer: The bar specializes in rum with over 100 varieties from around the world, crafted into creative tiki-style cocktails in a tropical setting.

faqs.question: Is Rum Sugar Lime good for groups?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! The lively, festive atmosphere makes it perfect for golf groups looking for a fun night out.

faqs.question: Where is Rum Sugar Lime?
faqs.answer: Located in Reno's Midtown district on S Virginia Street, surrounded by restaurants, bars, and shops.

meta.title: Rum Sugar Lime – Tropical Rum Bar in Reno Midtown | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Discover 100+ rums and creative tiki cocktails at Rum Sugar Lime in Reno's Midtown. A tropical après-golf escape.
